reactions.title: تذكير
reactions.windowsCommand: powershell.exe -Command "[Windows.UI.Notifications.ToastNotificationManager, Windows.UI.Notifications, ContentType = WindowsRuntime]; $template = [Windows.UI.Notifications.ToastNotificationManager]::GetTemplateContent([Windows.UI.Notifications.ToastTemplateType]::ToastText02); $texts = $template.GetElementsByTagName('text'); $texts.Item(0).InnerText = 'تذكير'; $texts.Item(1).InnerText = 'صل على النبي'; $toast = [Windows.UI.Notifications.ToastNotification]::new($template); $notifier = [Windows.UI.Notifications.ToastNotificationManager]::CreateToastNotifier('Notification Script'); $notifier.Show($toast)"
